author: jtrube
title: Tokyo Cardano Summit
description: Japanese interest in crypto and blockchain technology is growing, but many still do not actively invest or participate in any communities.
solution: Develop and produce an online trade fair in Japanese, showcasing the coolest things Cardano has to offer, appealing to absolute beginners.
experience: Over a decade of event production and content creation in the Japanese market for clients such as Google, Porsche, Ralph Lauren, and more.
